column4: basically i have already added fglrx driver under the xorg.conf, (9800 pro my card is)
i tried downloading it and manually compiling it
it was complaining about an error, wait a sec ill tell you what it said
it basically said kernel includes at /usr/src/linux/include not found or incomplete
but i thought linux-386 is the kernel sources
i looked at kernel-source-blahbalbhalh and my kernel version isn't there
you did download the right set of kernel headers?
there is a german university that has a free newsserver (wich is very good), but i cant't remember which one it is
news.individual.net (go to the web site first, registration required)
hmm you have to pay for this :(
sorry, didn't use it for quite some time
